Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Description: A young boy discovers he's a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Title: The Hobbit
Description: A hobbit embarks on a quest to recover treasure guarded by a dragon.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: A young girl learns about racism and justice in the South during the 1930s.
A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and control to maintain power.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Description: A tale of love, wealth, and corruption set during the Roaring Twenties.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Description: A witty exploration of love and social standing in 19th-century England.

Title: The Catcher in the Rye
Description: A disillusioned teenager narrates his life in New York City and his quest for identity.

Title: Moby-Dick
Description: Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt the great white whale, Moby Dick.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia
Description: A series of seven fantasy novels set in the magical land of Narnia.

Title: War and Peace
Description: A historical epic set during the Napoleonic wars in Russia.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Description: A young man’s portrait ages while he remains eternally young and beautiful, as he descends into corruption.

Title: Frankenstein
Description: A scientist creates a creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment, with tragic results.

Title: Brave New World
Description: In a future society that has eliminated suffering, individuality and freedom are sacrificed for stability.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: The first part of the epic fantasy trilogy about the quest to destroy the One Ring.

Title: The Hunger Games
Description: In a dystopian future, children are selected to fight in a televised death match.

Title: The Da Vinci Code
Description: A professor unravels a secret hidden in Leonardo da Vinci’s works.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Description: A journalist and a hacker investigate a wealthy family’s dark secrets.

Title: The Shining
Description: A family’s stay in an isolated hotel leads to supernatural horrors and madness.

Title: The Road
Description: A father and son navigate a post-apocalyptic world in search of survival.

Title: The Outsiders
Description: A group of teenagers struggle with social class differences and violence.

Title: The Catcher in the Rye
Description: A disillusioned teenager narrates his life in New York City and his quest for identity.

Title: Catch-22
Description: A satirical novel about the absurdity of war and the bureaucratic insanity surrounding it.

Title: The Secret Garden
Description: A young girl discovers a hidden garden that transforms her life and those around her.

Title: Little Women
Description: The four March sisters grow up and navigate challenges of love, loss, and ambition.

Title: Don Quixote
Description: The story of a deluded knight and his squire on adventures filled with comical misadventures.
